ygData.subject: my opinions on power issues
ygData.msgSnippet: I d just like to say that from what I ve heard, all classes are suppose to be equal, ESPECIALY in the high levels.  One of the things that Verant has been
ygData.messageBody:
I'd just like to say that from what I've heard, all classes are suppose to
be equal, ESPECIALY in the high levels. One of the things that Verant has
been bragging about for a long time is the fact that a level 50 warrior
could stand toe to toe with a level 50 wizzard or a level 50 shadow knight
and the chances of winning would be 50-50. Of course, I've never actualy
passed level 20 so I wouldn't know...Equiptment is suppose to be one of the
equaling factors. Warriors are suppose to get a shitload of kewl weaps and
armer that no other class can, and so on. But I have to agree, looking at
the game in turms of my lvl 7 shadow knight, I look pretty danm weak. Just
my two cents


Kanndar
